issue.title: Since #895 organism manager has been added, metadata edit may get locked
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Since #895 organism manager has been added, metadata edit may get locked.

Visible only if versioning has been used, or if version IDs differ from metadata IDs.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

sdiFactory::getSdiUser()->authorizeOnMetadata should be used on MD version instead of sdiFactory::getSdiUser()->authorize
